Melodies of Joy
by idlechild



搬运授权







作品简介

翻译

这个作品是在我某次心烦意乱的时候构思出来的，我希望创作出一个充满欢乐气氛但同时也能表达当时的心情的作品。这个作品的风格与我另一个即将发布的大型作品的相同，因为它们属于同一个世界观。这个作品受到了一点点的蒸汽朋克风格影响，虽然我觉得它并不能被归为那种风格。第一张渲染图背景中左边的飞船是我将发布的下一个作品的一部分，并不是这个作品的一部分。

原文

Originally conceived during a time when I was upset and frustrated, I wanted to create something joyous and celebratory that also captured some elements of the mood I was in. The style employed is intentionally in the same vein as a rather massive project I have been working on and will be releasing soon, as both of these projects are part of the same universe. There is a somewhat distant steampunk influence going on, though i don't think it could properly be labelled as such. The ship flying in the background on the left in the first render is a small part of the next project I will be uploading, and not properly a part of this one.
